title: Passenger vehicle volume to rise by 5-7 per cent, touch new peak in next fiscal: Report
description: Passenger vehicle volumes are expected to grow 5-7% in the next fiscal, driven by the SUV segment. Demand for SUVs has doubled its market share to 60% this fiscal. The preference for SUVs is expected to grow further with new model launches, including electric variants.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
